sentences.english: a nuclear limitation treaty
sentences.chinese: 核限制条约

detailed_translations.chinese: 限制， 限度； 局限
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of controlling or reducing something

sentences.english: ...areas of open grassland.
sentences.chinese: ...开阔的草地区域。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land covered with wild grass

sentences.english: the enormous variety of marine life
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物繁多的种类

sentences.english: the effects of oil pollution on marine mammals
sentences.chinese: 石油污染对海洋哺乳动物的影响

sentences.english: marine biology
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物学

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea and the creatures that live there

sentences.english: second-year undergraduates
sentences.chinese: 大学二年级学生

detailed_translations.english: a student at college or university, who is working for their first degree

sentences.english: I gave the floor a good scrub .
sentences.chinese: 我把地板仔细刷洗了一遍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矮树；洗擦；擦洗者；矮小的人（或物）
detailed_translations.english: low bushes and trees that grow in very dry soil
to rub something hard, especially with a stiff brush, in order to clean it

detailed_translations.chinese: 矮小的；临时凑合的；次等的
detailed_translations.english: small, stunted, or inferior

sentences.english: the British Medical Journal
sentences.chinese: 《英国医学杂志》

sentences.english: He decided to keep a journal.
sentences.chinese: 他决定记日记。

detailed_translations.english: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest

sentences.english: India has a good scientific research base.
sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop
not having good moral principles
to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

sentences.english: He specializes in archaeology.
sentences.chinese: 他专修考古学。

sentences.english: In my recent research, I found that all three come together and, what is more, they help me to show that archaeology has relevance – it is not just old stones and bones.
sentences.chinese: 我在最近的研究中发现，这三点综合发生着作用，除此之外，它们也帮助我发现考古学的重要意义，它不仅仅意味着一堆石头和骨头。

sentences.english: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.chinese: 在那里的考古学特别是农村地区，我们并没有获得干净的水，有没有基本的教育的机会，“她说。

detailed_translations.english: the study of ancient societies by examining what remains of their buildings,  grave s  , tools etc

sentences.english: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) ..
sentences.chinese: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.english: There is no direct reference to her own childhood in the novel.
sentences.chinese: 小说里没有直接提及她自己的童年。

detailed_translations.english: the act of looking at sth for information

sentences.english: the classical theory of relativity
sentences.chinese: 经典相对论

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a traditional style or set of ideas

sentences.english: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…介绍基本情况，做…的提要
detailed_translations.english: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it
a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

sentences.english: Switch from one module to another.
sentences.chinese: 从一个模块转换到另一个模块。

sentences.english: In this step, you create a new module for the selector.
sentences.chinese: 在此步骤中，您将为选择器创建一个新的模块。

sentences.english: You then iterate the modules that depended on you and remove this module from their lists.
sentences.chinese: 然后迭代具有依赖性的模块，并将这个模块从这些列表中删除。

detailed_translations.english: one of several parts of a piece of computer software that does a particular job

sentences.english: the threat of compulsory redundancies
sentences.chinese: 强制性裁员的威胁

sentences.english: Car insurance is compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 汽车保险是强制性的。

detailed_translations.english: that must be done because of a law or a rule

sentences.english: the classification of wines according to quality
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒按品质的分类

sentences.english: There are five job classifications.
sentences.chinese: 有五种工作类别。

detailed_translations.english: a process in which you put something into the group or class it belongs to

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

sentences.english: You should never judge a person by their looks.
sentences.chinese: 决不要以貌取人。

sentences.english: Judge us on the improvements we make in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 请根据我们在经济方面取得的进步来评价我们。

sentences.english: The therapist judged that Margaret had made a serious attempt to kill herself.
sentences.chinese: 治疗专家断定玛格丽特曾真的企图自杀。

sentences.english: pollutants that were judged hazardous to human health
sentences.chinese: 被认为对人体健康有害的污染物

sentences.english: I am in no position to judge whether what she is doing is right or wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我无权评判她在做的事是对是错。

sentences.english: The economic results of the reforms are very difficult to judge.
sentences.chinese: 这些改革所带来的经济成效很难评价。

sentences.english: The likelihood of future bombs was impossible to judge.
sentences.chinese: 未来发生爆炸案的可能性无法预测。

sentences.english: We judge the success of a product by the number of sales it brings in.
sentences.chinese: 我们以销量来评价一种产品成功与否。

sentences.english: His conduct, judged objectively by what he has done, is dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为，从他所做的这一切客观地来评价，是不诚实的。

sentences.english: Robert wanted to go and help him, but judged it best to stay where he was.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特想过去帮他，但考虑之后还是觉得待在原地为妙。

sentences.english: Do not judge her too harshly, as she was very young at the time.
sentences.chinese: 对她的评价不要太苛刻，毕竟那时候她还很年轻。

detailed_translations.english: to form or give an opinion about someone or something after thinking carefully about all the information you know about them
the official in control of a court, who decides how criminals should be punished

sentences.english: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 这一传统源于中世纪。

sentences.english: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.chinese: 起源不明的古老民间传说

detailed_translations.chinese: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统
detailed_translations.english: the place or situation in which something begins to exist

sentences.english: oral history
sentences.chinese: 口述的历史

sentences.english: an oral agreement
sentences.chinese: 口头协议

detailed_translations.english: spoken, not written
a spoken test, especially in a foreign language

sentences.english: Is the engine running smoothly?
sentences.chinese: 发动机运转平稳吗？

sentences.english: We were stranded with engine trouble on a deserted highway.
sentences.chinese: 我们因发动机故障而被困在空无一人的公路上。

sentences.english: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 1941年，火车可能已由蒸汽机车来牵引了。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a vehicle that produces power to make it move

sentences.english: The room had seating capacity for about 80.
sentences.chinese: 这房间能坐80个人左右。

sentences.english: The orchestra played to a capacity crowd (= the largest number of people who can fit into a hall, theatre etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 管弦乐队为满场的观众演奏。

sentences.english: All the hotels were filled to capacity.
sentences.chinese: 所有的宾馆都住满了。

sentences.english: a child’s capacity for learning
sentences.chinese: 孩子的学习能力

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space a container, room etc has to hold things or people

sentences.english: She prefers her coffee black.
sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: to like someone or something more than someone or something else, so that you would choose it if you could

sentences.english: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商业的， 商务的； 商品化的， 商业性的
detailed_translations.english: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services

sentences.english: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.english: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on

sentences.english: the harmful effects of smoking
sentences.chinese: 吸烟的害处

detailed_translations.english: causing harm

sentences.english: crime/unemployment, etc. statistics
sentences.chinese: 犯罪、失业等统计资料

sentences.english: According to official statistics the disease killed over 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 根据官方的统计数字，500多人死于这种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of information shown in numbers

sentences.english: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.english: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.chinese: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.english: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 注解在书末。

detailed_translations.english: something that you write down to remind you of something

sentences.english: He did not raise the subject again.
sentences.chinese: 他再也没有提起这个话题。

sentences.english: I’d like to raise the issue of publicity.
sentences.chinese: 我想提一提宣传问题。

sentences.english: Betty raised the important question of who will be in charge.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂提出了一个重要问题，就是将由谁来负责。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to talk or write about a subject that you want to be considered or a question that you think should be answered

sentences.english: I offered to pay the cost of the taxi.
sentences.chinese: 我提出支付出租车费。

sentences.english: Insurance to cover the cost of a funeral is possible.
sentences.chinese: 可以用保险支付葬礼费用。

sentences.english: This doesn’t include the cost of repairing the damage.
sentences.chinese: 这不包括修理破损的费用。

sentences.english: the terrible cost of the war in death and suffering
sentences.chinese: 这场战争造成的死亡与苦难的惨重代价

sentences.english: low cost housing
sentences.chinese: 低成本住宅

sentences.english: the high cost of production
sentences.chinese: 很高的生产成本

sentences.english: A cassette/radio is included at no extra cost .
sentences.chinese: 附送一台卡式收录机。

sentences.english: The funds will just cover the museum’s running costs .
sentences.chinese: 这些资金只够支付博物馆的运转费用。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you have to pay in order to buy, do, or produce something

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

sentences.english: She loaded the new software .
sentences.chinese: 她给电脑装上新的软件。

sentences.english: a software company
sentences.chinese: 软件公司

detailed_translations.english: the sets of programs that tell a computer how to do a particular job

sentences.english: This job is so boring. I wish I could do something more creative.
sentences.chinese: 这工作太单调了，我希望能做些更有创造性的事情。

sentences.english: I teach creative writing at Trinity College.
sentences.chinese: 我在三一学院教创意写作。

sentences.english: the creative process of writing a poem
sentences.chinese: 写诗的创作过程

sentences.english: Diaghilev did his great creative work in France.
sentences.chinese: 狄亚格列夫在法国编创了富有创新性的伟大作品。

sentences.english: a creative solution to the problem
sentences.chinese: 这一问题的创新性解决方法

detailed_translations.english: involving the use of imagination to produce new ideas or things

sentences.english: a High School diploma
sentences.chinese: 高中毕业文凭

detailed_translations.english: a document showing that a student has successfully completed their high school or university education

sentences.english: Upon receipt of a copy of the arbitration application, the respondent shall, within the time limit prescribed by the Arbitration Rules, submit its defence to the arbitration commission.
sentences.chinese: 被申请人收到仲裁申请书副本后，应当在仲裁规则规定的期限内向仲裁委员会提交答辩书。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has to defend their own case in a law court, especially in a  divorce  case

sentences.english: My whole future now seemed uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 现在我的前途似乎是个未知数。

detailed_translations.english: feeling doubt about something

sentences.english: There has been a gradual change in climate.
sentences.chinese: 气候渐渐发生了变化。

sentences.english: the gradual decline in manufacturing industry
sentences.chinese: 制造业的逐渐衰退

sentences.english: Education is a gradual process.
sentences.chinese: 教育是一个循序渐进的过程。

detailed_translations.english: happening slowly over a long period of time

sentences.english: each individual’s right to privacy
sentences.chinese: 每个人的隐私权

detailed_translations.english: the state of being free from public attention

sentences.english: Someone had scribbled a note in the margin .
sentences.chinese: 有人在页边写了条批注。

sentences.english: Use double spacing and wide margins to leave room for comments.
sentences.chinese: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

sentences.english: the western margin of southern Africa
sentences.chinese: 非洲南部的西隅

detailed_translations.english: the empty space at the side of a page

sentences.english: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.chinese: 但您只能在实现所有方法的情况下获得最大收益，因为它们的力量来自它们之间的交互。

sentences.english: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.chinese: 但您只有在实现所有方法的情况下才能获得最多的收益，因为它们的力量来自于它们之间的相互作用。

sentences.english: The real power of the concept comes not from any one of these devices; it emerges from the interaction of all of them.
sentences.chinese: 这个概念的很正力量并不来自于这些设备的任何一个；它来自于这些设备之间的交互。

detailed_translations.english: a process by which two or more things affect each other

sentences.english: At the end of this chapter there is a select bibliography of useful books.
sentences.chinese: 本章末尾附着有用书籍的精选书目。

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the books and articles used in preparing a piece of writing

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

sentences.english: This is a very important piece of legislation (= law ).
sentences.chinese: 这是一条非常重要的法规。

detailed_translations.english: a law or set of laws

sentences.english: Employees expect flexibility in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 员工们盼望工作安排有弹性。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to change or be changed easily to suit a different situation

sentences.english: The factor that distinguishes this company from the competition is customer service.
sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

sentences.english: The main distinguishing feature of this species is the leaf shape.
sentences.chinese: 这一品种的主要特征是叶子的形状。

detailed_translations.english: to be the thing that makes someone or something different or special

sentences.english: The device was thrown at an army patrol but failed to explode.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹投向了陆军巡逻队，但没有爆炸。

sentences.english: Far sooner than anyone thought possible, the Russians exploded an atomic bomb.
sentences.chinese: 苏联引爆了一颗原子弹，大大早于任何人的预期。

detailed_translations.english: to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage
to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage

sentences.english: a sporting celebrity
sentences.chinese: 体育明星

sentences.english: He’s a national celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 他是全国有名的人物。

sentences.english: We invited a number of minor celebrities (= people who are not very famous ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请了一些小有名气的人物。

sentences.english: celebrity chef/gardener etc
sentences.chinese: 名厨/名人园艺师等

detailed_translations.english: a famous living person

sentences.english: Many journalists here choose to pigeon all but the most innocuous of stories.
sentences.chinese: 除了平淡乏味的报道，这儿的新闻记者将一切通过鸽子传递出去。

sentences.english: As the name implies, pigeon is an awkward pose, and it happens to be the most challenging for me.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，鸽子式是一个很棘手的姿势，它对于我来说是最有挑战性的。

sentences.english: Start slow with forward bends and calf stretches, move on to pigeon pose and plow at the end.
sentences.chinese: 开始时缓慢的前倾伸展和小腿伸展，然后摆出鸽子的姿势再是犁头的姿势。

detailed_translations.english: a grey bird with short legs that is common in cities

sentences.english: The governor gave only a vague outline of his tax plan.
sentences.chinese: 州长只是含糊地大致说了一下他的税务计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不明确的； 含糊的； 暧昧的
detailed_translations.english: unclear because someone does not give enough detailed information or does not say exactly what they mean

sentences.english: the urgent need to exploit the resources of the Irish Sea
sentences.chinese: 开发爱尔兰海资源的迫切需要

detailed_translations.english: to develop and use minerals, forests, oil etc for business or industry

sentences.english: He made no attempt to disguise his agitation.
sentences.chinese: 他无意掩饰他的不安。

sentences.english: He is a master of disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他是伪装高手。

detailed_translations.english: to hide sth or change it, so that it cannot be recognized
the art of changing your appearance so that people do not recognize you

sentences.english: ...the consumer price index.
sentences.chinese: …消费价格指数。

detailed_translations.english: a standard by which the level of something can be judged or measured

sentences.english: a chemistry text
sentences.chinese: 化学课本

detailed_translations.english: a textbook
to send someone a written message on a  mobile phone

sentences.english: Try to keep your account of events as factual as possible.
sentences.chinese: 你要尽量如实地说明情况。

detailed_translations.english: based on facts or relating to facts

sentences.english: digital TV
sentences.chinese: 数字电视

sentences.english: a digital signal
sentences.chinese: 数字信号

sentences.english: a digital camera
sentences.chinese: 数码照相机

sentences.english: digital recording
sentences.chinese: 数字录音

detailed_translations.english: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

sentences.english: the editor of the Daily Telegraph
sentences.chinese: 《每日电讯报》的主编

detailed_translations.english: the person who is in charge of a newspaper or magazine, or part of a newspaper or magazine, and decides what should be included in it

sentences.english: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的婚姻状况是什么？

detailed_translations.english: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc

sentences.english: These findings have both theoretical and practical applications.
sentences.chinese: 这些发现具有理论和实际的应用。

sentences.english: In this process, an interaction of theoretical study with practical work . should be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，要加强理论的探讨和工作推进的互动作用。

sentences.english: Researchers have tossed around theoretical calculations of using just aluminum and water for rocket propellant in the past.
sentences.chinese: 研究者在过去辗转不安的进行理论计算，仅仅只用铝和水作为火箭燃料。

sentences.english: People here like their freedom and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 这里的人喜欢他们所拥有的自由与隐私权。

sentences.english: the rights and freedoms of citizens
sentences.chinese: 公民的权利与自由

sentences.english: the freedom to vote
sentences.chinese: 选举自由

sentences.english: He thinks children have too much freedom these days.
sentences.chinese: 他认为如今的孩子太自由了。

detailed_translations.english: the right to do what you want without being controlled or restricted by anyone

sentences.english: Teaching young children is a challenging and rewarding job.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿教育是一项具有挑战性和有意义的工作。

sentences.english: a challenging problem
sentences.chinese: 具有挑战性的难题

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑战的；引起挑战性兴趣的
detailed_translations.english: difficult in an interesting or enjoyable way

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求；质疑；反对；向…挑战；盘问（challenge的ing形式）

sentences.english: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.chinese: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.english: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.chinese: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.english: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.chinese: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
detailed_translations.english: someone’s family, education, previous work etc

sentences.english: The central section of the book is a historical overview of drug use.
sentences.chinese: 本书的中心部分是对药物使用的一个历史概述。

detailed_translations.english: a short description of a subject or situation that gives the main ideas without explaining all the details

sentences.english: John and I sat up until the early hours chatting.
sentences.chinese: 我和约翰聊到凌晨才睡。

detailed_translations.english: to talk in a friendly informal way, especially about things that are not important

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

sentences.english: His kind smile soon generated friendliness.
sentences.chinese: 他友善的微笑很快造成了友好的气氛。

sentences.english: But American friendliness is not always an offer of true friendship.
sentences.chinese: 然而美国人的友好并不总是真正友情的表示。

sentences.english: We exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.english: It’s a place where people can chat and exchange ideas.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.english: Four of my cassettes for your Madonna CD is a fair exchange.
sentences.chinese: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something and receive the same kind of thing from them at the same time
the act of giving someone something and receiving something else from them

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.english: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

sentences.english: the upper lip
sentences.chinese: 上唇

detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

sentences.english: a cautious driver
sentences.chinese: 一位谨慎的司机

sentences.english: a cautious approach to the crisis
sentences.chinese: 处理危机的谨慎态度

sentences.english: The air-pollution board has reacted with cautious optimism to the announcement.
sentences.chinese: 空气污染委员会对这项通告表示谨慎乐观。

detailed_translations.english: careful to avoid danger or risks

sentences.english: He is currently writing a dissertation on the Somali civil war.
sentences.chinese: 他正在写一篇关于索马里内战的论文。

detailed_translations.chinese: (博士学位)论文，学术演讲，专题论文
detailed_translations.english: a long piece of writing on a particular subject, especially one written for a university degree

sentences.english: Teaching methodologies vary according to the topic.
sentences.chinese: 教学方法因题目而不同。

detailed_translations.english: A methodology is a system of methods and principles for doing something, for example for teaching or for carrying out research
